Package uno.anahata.asi.model.resource

Class TextFileResource

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.resource.AbstractResource<Path>
uno.anahata.asi.model.resource.AbstractPathResource<String,String>
uno.anahata.asi.model.resource.TextFileResource
public class TextFileResource extends AbstractPathResource<String,String>
A concrete resource representing a text file loaded into the context. It is a stateful, permanent resource by default and manages its own viewport. It implements the 'Atomic Reload' architecture for self-healing updates.
Author:
anahata-ai

  • Method Details

    • reload

      public void reload() throws Exception
      Description copied from class: AbstractPathResource
      Atomically reloads the resource's content from disk, processes it through the viewport, and updates the cached Part. This method must be implemented by concrete subclasses.
      Specified by:
      reload in class AbstractPathResource<String,String>
      Throws:
      Exception - if any error occurs during the reload process.

    • getTurnsRemaining

      public Integer getTurnsRemaining()
      Description copied from class: AbstractResource
      Gets the number of turns remaining before this resource is pruned. The implementation of this method defines the resource's lifecycle policy.
      Specified by:
      getTurnsRemaining in class AbstractResource<Path>
      Returns:
      The number of turns left, or null if the resource is permanent/stateful.

    • buildHeader

      protected String buildHeader()
      Description copied from class: AbstractResource
      Builds the base header string for this resource, including all core metadata. Subclasses should override this to add more specific details, calling super() first.
      Overrides:
      buildHeader in class AbstractPathResource<String,String>
      Returns:
      The comprehensive base header string.
